MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G65 postcode area of Kilsyth. Engineers have not got authorization from the emergency service to investigate our equipment after a critical incident and we still expect all power to be restored by 4pm. We understand that to be without power is frustrating and we apologise for this. We will update this message if this information changes. Thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2PM on Sunday 24 January 2021.
